name: Caching Headers
short_description: Send the headers Cache-Control and Expires used by clients and proxies to cache requests

documentation.description: The [CachingHeaders](https://ktor.io/docs/caching.html) plugin adds the capability to configure the `Cache-Control` and `Expires` headers used for HTTP caching. You can introduce different caching strategies for specific content types, such as images, CSS and JavaScript files, and so on.
